Enrollment Information

Nursery Kinder Elementary
back to Journey
School Visit

Discover Our World. Schedule a tour to experience our vibrant learning environment and see our philosophy in action.

Admission Fee

Secure the Spot. Settle the initial admission fee to officially move forward with your child's application process.

Submit Enrollment Form

Complete the Details. Provide us with the necessary documents and information to help us get to know your child better.

Tuition Fee

Finalize Administration. You will receive an official invoice for the tuition fee. Once settled, the administrative process is complete.

Enroll

Start the Journey. Welcome to the Almacita family! Your child is now officially enrolled and ready to flourish.

School Visit

Discover Our World. Schedule a tour to experience our vibrant learning environment and see our philosophy in action.

Admission Fee

Secure the Spot. Settle the initial admission fee to officially move forward with your child's application process.

Submit Enrollment Form

Complete the Details. Provide us with the necessary documents and information to help us get to know your child better.

Trial

Experience the Classroom. Let your child spend a day with us to immerse themselves in our joyful and meaningful learning activities.

Observation & Parents Interview

Deepening the Connection. We will observe your child’s interactions while chatting with you to align our shared goals for their growth.

Acceptance Letter

The Official Welcome. Receive your formal acceptance notification, marking the beginning of your family’s journey with Almacita.

Invoice

Finalize Registration. You will receive a tuition fee invoice to complete the administrative phase of the enrollment.

Uniform Fitting

Ready for Adventure. Visit us for a uniform fitting to ensure your little learner is comfortable and prepared for their first day.

Enroll

Start the Journey. Welcome to the Almacita family! Your child is now officially enrolled and ready to flourish.
